# Latex table for the main model

```{r}
left_join(
  select(mayo, group, RR, lci, uci),
  group_effects(bg_mayo_partial, s=T, transform = exp)[,,1] %>%  
    round(2) %>% 
    as.data.frame() %>% 
    rownames_to_column() %>% 
    select(rowname, mean, lci, uci) %>% rename(group = rowname),
  by = "group"
) %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = TRUE,
      col.names = c("Study", "mean", "LCI", "UCI", "mean", "LCI", "UCI")) %>% 
  add_header_above(c("", "Observed (risk ratio)" = 3, "Posterior (risk ratio)" = 3))
```

```{r}
library(wwmisc)
bgc_all <- baggr_compare(
  "Partial, all data" = bg_mayo_partial,
  "Partial, no DEVTA" = bg_mayond_partial,
  "Full, all data" = bg_mayo_full,
  "Full, no DEVTA" = bg_mayond_full
)
bgc_exp <- baggr_compare(
  "Partial, all data" = bg_mayo_partial,
  "Partial, no DEVTA" = bg_mayond_partial,
  "Full, all data" = bg_mayo_full,
  "Full, no DEVTA" = bg_mayond_full,
  transform = exp
)
bgc_table <- function(x, sd=TRUE,pooling = TRUE){
  if(sd){
    ll <- lapply(
      list(x$mean_trt, x$sd_trt, x$posteriorpd_trt), function(ll) {
        apply(ll, 1, function(x) paste3(x[2],x[1],x[3]))
      }) %>% data.frame() %>% setNames(c("Hypermean", "Hyper-SD", "p.p.d."))
  }else{
    ll <- lapply(
      list(x$mean_trt, x$posteriorpd_trt), function(ll) {
        apply(ll, 1, function(x) paste3(x[2],x[1],x[3]))
      }) %>% data.frame() %>% setNames(c("Hypermean", "p.p.d."))
    # rownames(ll) <- outcome_names_short[rownames(ll)]
  }
  if(pooling)
    ll$Pooling <- lapply(x$models, function(x) {
      p <- pooling(x, type = "total", metric = "isq")[,,1]
      paste3(p[2], p[1], p[3])
    })
  ll
}
bgc_table(bgc_all) %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  row_spec(1, bold=T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down"))

bgc_table(bgc_exp,sd=FALSE,pooling=FALSE) %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  row_spec(1, bold=T)

```
